Heptameron, the seven dayes: that is, meditations and prayers, vpon the vvorke of the Lords creation Together with other certaine prayers and meditations, most comfortable for all estates, & c. By M. A. Symson, minister at Dalkeith. Simson, Archibald, 1564-1628.
[18], 207, [1] p.
Printed by Edward Raban, printer to the Vniversitie, Sainct-Andrews : 1621.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
